text: Muriel Elizabeth Bowser (born August 2, 1972) is an American politician and member of the Democratic Party. She is serving as the eighth Mayor of the District of Columbia. She succeeded Vincent C. Gray on January 2, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Campaign website * Official site Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:African-American politicians Category:Mayors of Washington, D.C. Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Muriel Bowser
